Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, convenient!”
Reviews.Author: sbruce912
Reviews.Content: returned day break berlin hotel situated kurfurstendamm main roads city centre approximately 30 minute walk berlin zoo 10 minutes nearest metro station line u7 europa city typical european style establishment offering fairly basic facilities staff affable obliging conversing english particularly ceilings relatively spacious comfortable beds decent bathrooms furnishings respectable standard breakfast ok hot choices partially rotate morning rolls bread meats cheeses various yogurts fruits insulated quiet night lift capacity claustrophobic overall require fairly central base access public transportation system tick boxes

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: marmitchy
Reviews.Content: liked hotel clean plenty space move wardrobe comfortable bed free wiifi fast connections location 2 ubahn bus stop front hotel front desk people nice willing help guests time breakfast plenty hot cold meat selections stayed hotel eve bottles wine lovely gesture restaurants plenty shopping center kdamm 4 minutes foot crowded quiet night bathroom adequately sized toiletries hair dryer shaving mirror overall recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Noemi M
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights dec 3031 clean beds comfortable plenty space move stayed warm stay breakfast plenty receptionists nice eager help guests location convenient situated 2 ubahn bus stop front hotel bathroom adequately sized internet fast free charge concern parking deal left 2 bottles wine lovely guests stay berlin

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staff and Hotel Clean and Adequate”

Reviews.Content: stayed 914 november liverpool weather fog 1c week city art gallery ubahn potsdamer platz station 15 mins walk 2800 paintings world top artists 13 18 century 2800 bc egypt rome museum island register museum bode museum bundestag online leave home chose preferred entry days times plan ahead months weather april europa hotel upgrading lounge bar totally adequate dont spend time hotel breakfast normal self service buffet ok watch booked student 40 italians kept themselves quietly 30 german youths girls friday night 1050 banging crashing doors bursting screaming shouting 330 am police called twice night porter control spread 10 floors usual drunks clever booking hotel location superb days meals evening meals 20 min walk 4 german cooking berliner specialties friendly waiters superb food huge portions real value expensive green lighted name window busy friday evenings breakfast time 5

Reviews.Title: “A very good proposition if you are not looking for luxuries”
Reviews.Author: AlexPOxford_UK
Reviews.Content: travelled berlin business stayed europa city 3 nights decent clean hotel spacious bathroom extravagant nice shower morning followed breakfast site seeing clean bed sleep night hotel tin value money wifi hotel people help lobby night till 2 oclock morning kept breakfast lights offered times free coffee helpful receptionists smiling cultural efficient helpful impressed taxi system guest taxi press button taxi 3 minutes breakfast rich choice hotel located underground stations lines giving alternatives travel city surprised comments read location hotel located hundred meters mecca shopaholics kurfürstendamm locally kudamm famous avenues berlin fashion designer shops imagine final elevator tricky especially rush hour morning slow people leaving wait time bottomline spend days decent hotel near centre berlin reasonable cost glamour

Reviews.Title: “nice stay but not in a very interesting area”
Reviews.Author: nogag
Reviews.Content: nice clean roomy renewed lately fridge box frustrating ac manage hotels breakfast staff includes helpful challenged speak english expect wild nightlife clubs etc hotel nice pubs occupied elders heard cab east smashing expensive metro 1 am

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: calabreseboy
Reviews.Content: decent hotel bustling happening berlin nicer berlin nightlife 2030 euro cab ride youre prepared metro lots restaurants staff werent particularly nice helped times didnt feel welcomed hotel special charm decently sized comfy beds warm day overall decent hotel considering price recommended people dont stay hostel dont fork hundreds euros stunning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - Good location”
Reviews.Author: Skygirl81
Reviews.Content: liked hotel location staff friendly nice value 3star berlin plenty restaurants near bar bars nearby anyway clean beds comfortable

Reviews.Title: “A good bed for the night”
Reviews.Author: Edgerzz
Reviews.Content: returned nights city hotel 16 friends uk mixed staff friendly friendly helpful breakfast fit purpose served bedrooms functional clean special shower bar lounge relax simply doesnt exist chairs reception noisy neighbours street noise summary location feature hotel encourages explore berlin spend little time sleep days city
